sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Level1 : Request approve to Card Supervisor
Level3 : CardMaker Rejected then close sub record [not use]
Level3 : CardMaker Approved then update main record
Level4 : User Approved(confirm) then close main record
Level1 : Update record before approve
Level3 : CardMaker Rejected then close main record [not use]
Level2 : Card Supervisor Rejected then update main record to close skip
Level2 : Request approve to Card Maker
Level3 : Request approve(confirm) to requester
Level2 : Card Supervisor Approved then update main record
Level4 : User Rejected then close main record [not use]
Level3 : CardMaker Approved then close sub record
Level2 : then create new sub record

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Level2 : then create new sub record
Level3 : Request approve(confirm) to requester
Level2 : Card Supervisor Approved then update main record
Level2 : Request approve to Card Maker
Level3 : CardMaker Rejected then close main record [not use]
Level3 : CardMaker Rejected then close sub record [not use]
Level4 : User Rejected then close main record [not use]
Level4 : User Approved(confirm) then close main record
Level2 : Card Supervisor Rejected then update main record to close skip
Level3 : CardMaker Approved then close sub record
Level1 : Request approve to Card Supervisor
Level3 : CardMaker Approved then update main record
Level1 : Update record before approve
